page.title: 09The Water Still Flows
page.content: concentration of iron and as a result white clothes turned orange when washed frequently in the water.Even the ground around the well is stained bright orange.The pumping equipment eventually fell into disrepair. The water now issues at a rate of three hundred litres (60 gallons) per minute and throughout the year its temperature remains constant at eleven degrees celsius.It is thought that the water originates about a hundred miles away in the Black Mountains of Wales .The water reaches here through porous rocks and a series of faults passing under the River Severn.
